title: How to Make Cinnamon and Sugar Apple Slices

steps.headline: Cut up some apples into either slices, or large chunks.
steps.description: The amount of apples you should use depends on how many people are eating it and how much they want to eat.

steps.headline: Place the cut up apple pieces in a small bowl.
Cover the apple slices in the bowl with sugar.
steps.description: Try and use the right amount. Avoid using to much, and avoid using too little.

steps.headline: Sprinkle about half as much cinnamon onto the apple slices as there was sugar.
Toss and shake the apples in the bowl until they are all fully covered with the cinnamon and sugar.

text: Cut up some apples into either slices, or large chunks. The amount of apples you should use depends on how many people are eating it and how much they want to eat. Place the cut up apple pieces in a small bowl.  Cover the apple slices in the bowl with sugar. Try and use the right amount. Avoid using to much, and avoid using too little. Sprinkle about half as much cinnamon onto the apple slices as there was sugar.  Toss and shake the apples in the bowl until they are all fully covered with the cinnamon and sugar.  Serve the snack and enjoy.
